+import numpy as np
+import tensorflow as tf
+import logging
+import sys
+
+import param_parse_dist
+
+args = param_parse_dist.parse_args()
+server, cluster, num_workers, gpu_options = param_parse_dist.workers_ps_creator(args)
+
+if args.job_name == "ps" :
+  server.join()
+elif args.job_name == "worker":
+  is_chief = (args.task_index == 0)
+  with tf.device(tf.contrib.model_average.model_average_device_setter(worker_device = "/job:worker/task:%d/gpu:%d" 
+             % (args.task_index, args.gpu_id), cluster=cluster)):
+    if is_chief:
+      xs = np.linspace(-0.5, 0.49, 100)
+    else:
+      xs = np.linspace(-1.0, 0.99, 100)
+    x = tf.placeholder(tf.float32, shape=[None], name="x")
+    y = tf.placeholder(tf.float32, shape=[None], name="y")
+    k = tf.Variable(0.0, name="k")
+    y_hat = tf.multiply(k, x, name="y_hat")
+    sse = tf.reduce_sum((y - y_hat) * (y - y_hat), name="sse")
+    train_op = tf.train.GradientDescentOptimizer(learning_rate=0.02).minimize(sse)
+    ma = tf.contrib.model_average.ModelAverageOptimizer(2, 1)
+
+config = tf.ConfigProto(gpu_options=gpu_options)
+config.log_device_placement = False
+config.allow_soft_placement = True
